# Hugo Narrow

> The documentation of Hugo Narrow.


## Changelog
- [Narrow v1.2.1](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.2.1/): This release add a new content type for projects and two shortcodes button, icon. - Published 2025-12-26

- [Narrow v1.1.6](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.6/): This release add custom content at homepage. - Published 2025-11-16
- [Narrow v1.1.5](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.5/): This release add dock display mode parameter. - Published 2025-09-05
- [Narrow v1.1.4](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.4/): This release add language switch mode parameters. - Published 2025-08-22
- [Narrow v1.1.3](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.3/): This release optimize some style and improve the experience of toc, add a template and a shortcode. - Published 2025-08-06
- [Narrow v1.1.2](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.2/): This release optimize the parameters of posts license. - Published 2025-07-02
- [Narrow v1.1.1](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.1/): This release fix the issues of gallery configuration. - Published 2025-06-25
- [Narrow v1.1.0](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.1.0/): This release refactor the configuration of gallery, add a shortcode of masonry gallery. - Published 2025-06-17
- [Narrow v1.0.0](http://localhost:1313/changelog/v1.0.0/): This release introduces the gallery; additionally, booth maps are automatically generated for posts ‚Ä¶ - Published 2025-06-14

### Content Management

- [Local Resources](http://localhost:1313/docs/content-management/local-resources/): Hugo Narrow support import local resources such as images with three methods:
Page Bundles (markdown ‚Ä¶
- [Archetypes](http://localhost:1313/docs/content-management/archetypes/): Archetypes is template for new content, located at ~/archetypes. A content file consists of ‚Ä¶
- [Frontmatter](http://localhost:1313/docs/content-management/frontmatter/): Frontmatter is configruation section at the beginning of markdown files, it uses two --- wrap ‚Ä¶
- [Markdown](http://localhost:1313/docs/content-management/markdown/): Hugo Narrow use Goldmark to render markdown files. By default, the superscript and the subscript are ‚Ä¶

### Configurations
- [Basic](http://localhost:1313/docs/configurations/basic-config/): Hugo supports hugo.toml„ÄÅhugo.yaml„ÄÅhugo.json format and follow the order, supporting split ‚Ä¶
- [Menus](http://localhost:1313/docs/configurations/menus/): Hugo Narrow supports three menusÔºö
Main menu at header footer menu social menu The icon is the icon ‚Ä¶
- [Multilingual](http://localhost:1313/docs/configurations/multilingual/): Hugo Narrow supports the multilingual sites, with a toggle button available in the navigation bar ‚Ä¶

### Features
- [SEO](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/seo/): SEO configuration used for Search Engine Optimization, favicon use SVG format.
params.yaml# Basic ‚Ä¶
- [Home](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/home/): Hugo Narro suports set the count of recent posts of home, you can also add custom sections to home. ‚Ä¶
- [Author](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/author/): Hugo Narrow author information render at hoempage, in the sample configuration, the avatar file is ‚Ä¶
- [Header](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/header/): Hugo Narrow supports set sticky header, logo, theme switch, dark mode switch, language switch.
logo ‚Ä¶
- [Dock](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/dock/): Hugo Narrow provide common function by dock, include back to top, back to previous page, jump to ‚Ä¶
- [Color Schemes](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/color-schemes/): Hugo Narrow build in many color schemes, you can change scheme by the button at header, custom ‚Ä¶
- [Posts](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/posts/): Hugo Narrow supports configure the license of posts and the related posts.
Tip
The parameters of ‚Ä¶
- [Comments](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/comments/): Hugo Narrow supports kinds of comments:
artalk disqus giscus twikoo utterances waline Tip

Baidu Clarity Google Umami params.yamlanalytics: ‚Ä¶

click to copy code language display collapse ‚Ä¶
- [Gallery](http://localhost:1313/docs/features/gallery/): Hugo Narrow supports lightbox, use GLightbox . Also justified gallery, use lickr-justified-gallery , ‚Ä¶

### Shortcodes
- [Build in Shortcodes](http://localhost:1313/docs/shortcodes/build-in-shortcodes/): Hugo has built in some shortcodes:
Details Figure Gist Highlight Instagram Param QR Ref Relref Vimeo ‚Ä¶
- [Extended Shortcodes](http://localhost:1313/docs/shortcodes/extended-shortcodes/): Delete the \ between {{ and }}.
Bilibili {\{&lt; bilibili VIDEO_ID PART_NUMBER &gt;}\} Support AV ‚Ä¶
